attributes.action: Allow the Red Arrows to perform at the 2012 Olympics.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Department of Culture, Media and Sport has announced that the Red Arrows are unsuitable for the Olympics in 2012 as "not in keeping with the event as they were too militaristically British".

This is a scandal and yet another attempt to erode our national identity as well as denying their remarkable display and skills to tens of thousands of people from all over the world.

Prime Minister, please reverse this decision and let them perform every day for the duration of the Olympics!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
